name: TheLisaCast
0:
”Alexa, launch The Lisa Cast”
”I like it”
”Tell me about podcast”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: the lisa cast
Developer Terms of Use
des:
This skill enables you to listen to audio posts by authors and media experts Lisa Brandt and Derek Botten, who are also authors of the book: "Make the Media Want You: An Insider's Guide to Creating Persuasive," available on Amazon here: https://www.amazon.com/Make-Media-Want-You-Persuasive/dp/0988158248

If you like a given post you are listening to, just say, "I like it." You can also say, "repeat," "skip" and if you want to find posts that mention specific words (for instance, "quotes"), just say "find" followed by the word(s) or ("Alexa, find 'quotes').

More about Lisa Brandt, please go to: https://www.linkedin.com/in/lisa-brandt-a6497111/

More about Derek Sweden, please go to: https://www.linkedin.com/in/derek-botten-219b0a1a/

This skill was designed, developed, and is being hosted by Witlingo. If you would like to launch your own cast, send an email to contact@witlingo.com
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
